rooms.name: Garage

rooms.name: Courtyard

rooms.name: Living Room

rooms.vastu_note: East direction supports health and prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen

openings.description: Main entrance door leading from the courtyard to the living room.
Large windows in the living room and kitchen for natural light and ventilation.
